TEXT.TITLE: AMERICAN INTERNATIONAL <AIG> SELLS AFRICAN UNIT
TEXT.BODY: American International Group Inc said it sold its South African subsidiary, American International Insurance Co Ltd, to Johannesburg Insurance Holdings Ltd, a holding company owned by a consortium of shareholders led by Rand Merchant Bank. Terms were not disclosed and company officials were unavailable for comment. With the conclusion of the sale, American International has entirely divested itself of its holdings in South Africa.
